page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE OF PENTON
page.content: Early in the morning the birds start to sing and it gets lighter. Usually the first noise is the clanking of the bottles of the{milkman.} He goes round to every house, sometimes whistling. Next the{paper boy}comes on his bike with the bright orange bag. Sometimes he carries a stereo with him. He has Howard Jones blasting out to disturb the silence. Then the{postman}comes in his van and empties the letter boxes and delivers the post. The people at the{stables}are getting ready to say goodbye and good luck to Cyndi, who is going to a two day event with her frisky bay mare Lady. After the excitement they go back to work. They muck out and feed and water the horses. They go up the fields to collect some horses for rides and then they groom them. The pheasants of{Chalkcroft Farm}are
